main_definition: Not costing a lot of money; affordable or cheap in terms of price.

meanings_and_examples.example: The store offers a wide range of inexpensive clothing options for budget shoppers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Cheaply made or of lower quality due to the lower cost.
meanings_and_examples.example: I found an inexpensive watch at the market, but it stopped working after a week.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Low-cost alternatives that may not have premium features compared to higher priced options.
meanings_and_examples.example: The inexpensive laptop had limited memory and was slower than more expensive models.
